name: Kitchen Rush (dbe3)
description:
BSEMC - Game Development Capstone. 

A 2D Pixel Time-management and Serious Game with a mix of First-Person and Third-Person situational gamification. Where the player is tasked to perform different sets of minigames in a restaurant with an amount of time given, not only but also tasked to take over various kinds of roles that most service crews specifically in the Philippines usually fulfill.

Kitchen Rush is a game that will offer a sense of urgency with multiple quick-timed minigames for the player to come across. It is a video game where you are tasked to perform different sets of minigames in a fast-food chain not only that, but also tasked to take over various kinds of roles that most service crews specifically in the Philippines usually executes. Additionally, you are tasked to manage your income and expenses properly in order to survive the day.

---

Game Controls:

LMB - Interact

--
